name: Le Chat Fonce: Petite Adventure
description:
Let's have some fun tonight! :D let's hunt fireflies!! #LOWREZJAM2017
Help Chat Fonce and explore the park area! There are locked doors who require keys to open it!

Controls W or Up Arrow to jump
A or Left Key to move left and D or Right Arrow to move Left

Press M for mute or unmute

Game made for  #LowRezJam2017    by Roberto Romao (me)

I hope you enjoy! Follow me on 
https://twitter.com/RobertoRomao

or

https://www.instagram.com/xinelu_rromao/

for news about my main project, Le Chat Foncé: a Proper Sequel!

Soundtrack

Deep_Forest and Town_Theme from RPG Maker asset pack

Ascending the Vale Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
